job_history.role_name: Corporate Facilitator, Performance Coach and Developer
job_history.work_description: Collaborate with senior leadership team to tailor training. Managed the design, development, implementation and administration of instructor-led corporate training including feedback survey forms, and supporting materials. Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of training programs with the client. Maintain high performance standards throughout the training through individual coaching.

job_history.role_name: Health Coach and Corporate Health Educator
job_history.work_description: Coached patients using motivational interviewing skills to guide them in the direction of their unique goals. Employed creativity in planning and delivering wellness initiatives for individual behavior change. Centered coaching on a balanced program approach which included aspects of physical, social, occupational, intellectual and emotional wellness.

job_history.role_name: Health Coach and Corporate Health Educator
job_history.work_description: Provided objective direction, creativity and ideas in planning and delivering wellness initiatives. I developed results-oriented wellness program for the corporations and individuals. Program design included interventions for incentives, recognition campaigns and vendor selection.

job_history.role_name: Manager of Retail Systems, Project Manager and Trainer
job_history.work_description: Managed associates involving workflow, quality control, and conflict resolution and review process. Supervised the direction of multiple third party vendors in the development of corporate projects. Business liaison between external store automation and corporate business units.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in designing, developing, and implementing corporate training programs, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Coaching
skills.explanation: Has provided individual coaching and performance coaching, and has also developed results-oriented wellness programs, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Wellness and Health Education
skills.explanation: Has developed and delivered wellness initiatives, and has also employed creativity in planning and delivering wellness programs, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Motivational Interviewing

skills.name: Business Administration
